snippet: Bode Miller has elected to skip the remaining portion of the World Cup season, along with the world championships, to give his surgically repaired left knee more time to heal.
abstract: American skier Bode Miller elects to skip remaining portion of World Cup season, along with world championships, to give his surgically repaired left knee more time to heal; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller has elected to skip the remaining portion of the World Cup season, along with the world championships, to give his surgically repaired left knee more time to heal.

headline.main: Miller to Miss Rest of Year
headline.print_headline: Bode Miller to Miss Rest of Year
